text: James Goldie (born 29 June 1940) is a Scottish former professional footballer who played as a striker in the Football League for Luton Town and York City. ==References== Category:1940 births Category:Living people Category:People from Denny, Falkirk Category:Scottish footballers Category:Association football inside forwards Category:Kilsyth Rangers F.C. players Category:Luton Town F.C. players Category:York City F.C. players Category:Poole Town F.C. players Category:English Football League players Category:Falkirk F.C. players Category:Dundee United F.C. players Category:Bo'ness United F.C. players Category:Scottish Football League players
title: Jim Goldie
